weekly_top_story.headline: Health subsidies expire, launching millions of Americans into 2026 with steep insurance hikes
weekly_top_story.summary: Enhanced Affordable Care Act subsidies expired on January 1, 2026, causing average premium increases of 114% for over 20 million enrollees and potentially leading to 4.8 million dropping coverage, which could destabilize the insurance market and increase costs for remaining participants.

stories.headline: Healthcare-focused private equity firm Altaris acquires Tegria from Providence St. Joseph Health
stories.summary: Altaris, a healthcare private equity firm, acquired Tegria—a healthcare data and tech services provider—from Providence, signaling continued consolidation in healthcare IT and potential shifts in data management services for providers.

stories.headline: TeleTracking Launches First AI-Powered Patient Throughput Solution, Decision IQ®
stories.summary: TeleTracking launched Decision IQ, an AI-driven patient flow management tool now implemented at University of Louisville Health to address capacity constraints and improve hospital access, representing a key advancement in operational efficiency.
